front.title: SIP Forum - Fax Over IP Task Group Problem Statement

abstract.t: This memo is published for informational purposes to document theissues identified by the SIP Forum with respect to the transmissionof facsimile signaling messages and fax page data over InternetProtocol (IP) networks. Further, it is the intent of this memo toalert the IETF to the formation of a Fax Over IP Task Group withinthe SIP Forum chartered to investigate and address identified issuesas they relate to the deployment of fax services in SessionInitiation Protocol (SIP) networks.
